remarks: The subgroup generated by an element is exhausted by its multiples. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Sep-2015.)
statement:
cycsubg2.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
cycsubg2.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
cycsubg2.f $e |- F = ( x e. ZZ |-> ( x .x. A ) ) $.
cycsubg2.k $e |- K = ( mrCls ` ( SubGrp ` G ) ) $.
cycsubg2 $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ A e. X ) -> ( K ` { A } ) = ran F ) $.
$d .x. x $.
$d A x $.
$d G x $.
$d X x $.
